attributes.action: recognise the church of the flying spaghetti monster as a recognised religion and allow it's holidays etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see the Church of the Flying Spaghetti monster recognised alongside all other types of faith with the same legallity etc.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
